casebody.data:
Second Department,

March, 1944.

(Marcli 6, 1944.) Pearl Brooks, as Administratrix of the Estate of Sarah Summers, Deceased, Respondent, v. Sydelle Friedberg, Appellant-Respondent, Edward Goldberg, Defendant-Appellant, et al., Defendants.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. [See ante, pp. 825, 871, sub nom. Summers v. Friedberg.] Present — Close, P. J., Carswell, Adel, Lewis and Aldrich, JJ.
